home.title: Lib of Dev
home.subtitle: Master AI, Full-Stack Development & DevOps in One Place
home.description: 20+ Languages ‚Ä¢ AI/ML with Ollama ‚Ä¢ IoT ‚Ä¢ DevOps ‚Ä¢ Home Servers ‚Ä¢ 200+ Code Examples
home.quickTipsSubtitle: Instant answers to common development questions
home.languagesSubtitle: Choose a language to explore syntax, functions, and examples
home.surveyDescription: Share your feedback in our quick survey (2 min)
home.improvementsSubtitle: Thank you for your feedback! Based on your survey responses, we've implemented major updates across the app:
home.improvement1Text: Improved prompts for better responses, added limitations notice, and quick-action buttons for common tasks (explain code, find bugs, optimize, convert, add comments, write tests).
home.improvement2Text: Step-by-step guide, real-time validation, format checking, live API testing, and clearer error messages.
home.improvement3Text: Added dedicated section explaining offline-first approach, no trackers, local API storage, code review process, and open-source transparency.
home.improvement4Text: Added RAG, AI agents, MLOps, evaluation frameworks, AI safety/guardrails, and cost optimization topics to specialized sections.
home.improvement5Text: Clear explanation of why we use ads, real earnings data (500 users = $2.76/week), and confirmation that ads only cover costs‚Äîno developer salary.
home.improvementsFooter: üöÄ All major feedback points addressed. Thank you for shaping this app!

settings.surveyDescription: Help us improve! Share your thoughts (2 min)
settings.privacySecurityDescription:
‚Ä¢ Offline-first: content lives on your device.
‚Ä¢ No trackers: we do not collect personal data or analytics.
‚Ä¢ API keys: stored locally via AsyncStorage; never sent to our servers.
‚Ä¢ Release safety: every change is reviewed and tested before it goes live.
‚Ä¢ Open Source: audit the code on GitHub to ensure nothing malicious ships.
settings.privacySecurityCta: View source & privacy details on GitHub ‚Üó
settings.adsInfoDescription:
‚Ä¢ Light ads only: we keep placements minimal so the app stays clean.
‚Ä¢ Purpose: cover fixed costs (Google Play, infra/dev tools, GitHub, Apple soon).
‚Ä¢ No wage: ads do not pay us a salary‚Äîthey only offset bills.
‚Ä¢ Reality check: 500 users over a week ‚Üí 837 impressions ‚Üí $2.76 earned.
settings.adsInfoThanks: Thanks for helping keep this project free for everyone!

askAI.limitationsText: AI responses may contain errors or outdated info. Always verify critical code, test thoroughly, and use your judgment. The AI doesn't have real-time data or access to your local files.
